description: Geophysical exploration methods used for resource exploration & engineering applications. Emphasises seismic techniques, with additional practical investigations of non-seismic methods including potential field and electrical methods. Extends concepts introduced in ERTH2020. Includes significant exposure to practical computational exercises.
restricted:
Permission from the School of Earth & Environmental Sciences (sees@enquire.uq.edu.au) is required for students to enroll in this course.
Minimum enrolment quota of 15 students.
